CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 26, 1965, pg. 24, reads: "Winning Group - Members of the Satellites softball team, currently making a runaway of the Tri-Boro League championship race, are shown above. The Satellites are slated to meet the Rangerettes on Monday, July 5, at Kennard Field during the annual Independence Day celebration.  The team members are, left to right, front row: Pearl McCrommins, Alice Hampton, Carolyn Morton and Deborah Allen.  Second row: Ruby Robinson, Kathy Penn, Laverne Rutledge, Beatrice Allen, Sylvia Samuels, Donalda Allen, Shirl Bennett, Jacqueline Willis and Paula Smith.  Third row: Coach Thomas Allen, Beverly Burton, Donna Miller, Terrie Grandy, Gwen Williams, Beatrice Mahaffey, manager; Mildred Allen, assistant manager; Carrie Allen, Vikkie Jackson, captain; Claudia Bolden, Margaret Smith and Robert Mahaffey, coach. Rubin Robinson, a coach, is in background. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of "Satilites" softball team, from left, front row: Pearl McCrommins, Alice Hampton, Carolyn Morton, Deborah Allen; second row: Ruby Robinson, Kathy Penn, Laverne Rutledge, Beatrice Allen, Sylvia Samuels, Donalda Allen, Shirl Bennett, Jacqueline Willis, Paula Smith; third row: coach Thomas Allen, Beverly Burton, Donna Miller, Terrie Grandy, Gwen Williams, Beatrice Mahaffey, Mildred Allen, Carrie Allen, Vikkie Jackson, Claudia Bolden, Margaret Smith, coach Robert Mahaffey, and coach Rubin Robinson in background
